project.name: CMOS Starter
project.description: Mission orchestration starter kit with SQLite runtime helpers, security guardrails, and Mission Protocol templates.

critical_facts: Populate this list with the most important truths about your project before starting missions.
foundational-docs/roadmap_template.md and foundational-docs/tech_arch_template.md are the default templates for roadmap and architecture hand-offs.
constraints: Keep the distributed starter free of seeded mission or sprint data.
Maintain parity between the SQLite database and whichever file mirrors your team elects to manage.
Document updates to foundational references or runtime helpers in MASTER_CONTEXT.json.
